channel.title: Posts on Full Aware
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Full Aware

item.title: Homelab
item.description:
Objective

To have a single server with enough power to run nested vSphere 8 and Tanzu Kubernetes Grid with NSX. But with vSphere 8 I wanted to make sure I had something on the HCL. Dell PowerEdge R740 will carry the homelab moving forward.

item.title: K8s Waiting for Condition=Available=True
item.description: While working with Ansible for standing up a vanilla Kubernetes 1.25.5 cluster I found myself separating the the initial bootstrapping of the cluster, which includes intalling the CNI antrea from the rest of the configuration (metrics,metallb,contour) due to waiting for antrea to become Ready.

item.title: Coming Soon
item.description: Future home of Kubernetes, Python, VMware and homelab efforts.
